logicDescription: Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (433736) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

Persons with condition occurrence of referent concept (433736) or descendants, for the first time in the person's history, with at least 365 days of prior continuous observation. Persons exit cohort at the end of the observation period.

cohortName: Obesity prevalent cohort: Earliest of condition occurrence or observation of obesity diagnoses conceptset or BMI > 30 or body weight > 120kg
logicDescription: assumes that once observed to be obese, that state continues until end of observation
